mapper.select: select managerid,managername,password,rm.* from manager m left join manager_role mr on m.managerid=mr.manager_id left join role_menu rm on mr.role_id=rm.role_id where m.managerid = #{userid} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update manager set password = #{password} where managerid=#{userid}
mapper.select:
select managerid,managername,password from manager m where 1=1
and ( managername like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or managerid like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') )
